name: メイド物語
summary: You take the role as a young man who has recently found the job of his dreams: to train three maids in a number of household chores. The household chores can by anything from shopping, washing, cooking, and cleaning. You need to supervise your maids during their training and you need to decide if you should encourage or punish them when they do wrongs or rights. When the evening comes you need to give your maids some training in another area.
info:
• 中文名: 女仆物语
  • 别名: The Maid's Story
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1997/4/18
